name: Fetch Quest (grantreed)
description:
Be a dog, make a mess, and cause chaos in the office. In this realistic dog simulator, you get the entire experience as seen from a dog. Explore the area to find exciting activities from shooting a gun to playing pool. Rack up your points in single player or multiplayer with your friends.

 Controls:- WASD to move - (space) to jump - (e) to interact/pick up/drop - (f) to bark/use item - (r) to make a mess 

Credits: - Loc Trinh, Grant Reed, Gavin Schefer, Adrian Portillo, Alex Pham, Tyler Kaplan, Brian Caballero, Daichi Murokami, Sehun Heo, Shuai Wang
